note.p: Father of John Brodie Innes. Eldest son of Colonel Alexander Innes, who married Sarah Jeans of Northend Turville, Buckinghamshire, in 1761. Of Ibstone, Buckinghamshire. Married Mary Leslie in London in 1814. Lived in Brunswick Square, London, 1816; Hythe, Kent, 1836.
London Metropolitan Archives, Bloomsbury St George, register of baptisms (P82/GEO1, Item 004), register of marriages (P82/GEO1, Item 021)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/1863)
UK and Ireland, Find a Grave Index, 1300s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 October 2022)
